basic.blooming: Foliage plants, sometimes open light yellow flowers

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Resistant to shade, like scattered light
maintenance.watering: Likes wet environments, water thoroughly when soil is dry, avoid saturated water
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply once monthly in spring and autumn
maintenance.pruning: Remove old, diseased and dead leaves timely
